text: The Tower of Hercules (Galician and ) is an ancient Roman lighthouse in Spain. It is on a peninsula about from the centre of A Coruña, Galicia. The tower is a National Monument of Spain. Since June 27, 2009, it has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site.UNESCO website It is the second tallest lighthouse in Spain, after the Faro de Chipiona.
